DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether psycho-education group effective individual psycho-education patient bipolar disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Psycho-education Patients With Bipolar Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim study compare effect psycho-education group short individual psycho-education . It randomize controlled trial include Bipolar 1 2 patient stable euthymic phase . 42 43 patient receive group education 10 weekly session session every third month two year . 42 43 patient receive three individual session education . Symptoms , admittances hospital function follow two year .
DOC.criteria: Bipolar Disorder 1 2 Euthymic Active depression mania/hypomania
